name: Downfall (itch) (Shapkofil)
description:
1-button
1-bit
1-goal
save yourself from the rain using your very own understandable umbrella

[Controls]
S, Down-Arrow, Screen Touch or Left Mouse Click

Unfortunately the game was made twice because i deleted it on accident, ironically while trying to back it up.

Thankfully, the second iteration turn out better that the initial one.

The game was made for 4.5 hours but the version before that took around 14 hours.
